title: Black Night
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
William Baziotes [1912-1963], New York, NY; Kootz Gallery, New York, NY [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1955 [2].


Notes:
[1]. The Kootz Gallery lent the painting to "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955 (no. 15 in the catalogue). 
[2]. The painting was purchased from the International for Carnegie Institute at the suggestion of and with funds provided by Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA.
